</ul>

<h4>V2.1.7 - 08.12.2015</h4>

<ul>
<li>Changed: "Flush image cache" now removes images from the database w/o a gallery</li>
<li>Changed: "Show Meta" popup: parse date_format through date_i18n()</li>
<li>Changed: Made Add Gallery/Images notifications a link to the gallery</li>
<li>Changed: No longer cache displayed galleries as transients</li>
<li>Changed: Updated widgets to use PHP5 parent::__construct() over $this-&#62;WP_Widget()</li>
<li>Fixed:   C_NextGen_Metadata-&#62;get_EXIF() was bugged with imagebrowser-exif template</li>
<li>Fixed:   Cornerstone/X compatibility</li>
<li>Fixed:   Recovering images was 'generating' from backup instead of copying</li>
<li>Fixed:   Setting post thumbnail more than once on a page/post</li>
<li>Fixed:   Permanently hide display types from ATP without an active POPE module</li>
</ul>

<h4>V2.1.2 - 07.20.2015</h4>

<ul>
<li>NEW:     Ability to import from Media Library</li>
<li>NEW:     Added filter 'ngg_datamapper_table_name'</li>
<li>NEW:     Added filter <code>ngg_legacy_template_directories</code> for legacy template locator (thanks Ross McKay)</li>
<li>NEW:     Pagination available onManage Images page</li>
<li>NEW:     Added filter ngg_manage_images_items_per_page_array to control pagination options</li>
<li>NEW:     Added filters 'ngg_load_frontend_logic' and 'ngg_get_modules_to_load'</li>
<li>NEW:     Added filter 'ngg_add_page_shortcode' to control Manage Galleries &#62; 'Create new page' content</li>
<li>NEW:     Added filter 'ngg_manage_albums_items_order'</li>
<li>Changed: Removed PHP4 support</li>
<li>Fixed:   Ability to set NextGEN Image as Featured Image</li>
<li>Fixed:   Don't use resource manager in download requests for WP Photo Shelter</li>
<li>Fixed:   Updated custom jQuery-UI styling to resemble WordPress postbox styling</li>
<li>Fixed:   Styled plupload buttons to resemble WordPress buttons</li>
<li>Fixed:   Removed 'fixed' class from manage galleries table. Allows columns to adjust to content</li>
<li>Fixed:   Removed note about flash support and fixed typoe (thanks Rene Wolf)</li>
<li>Fixed:   Fixed typo in nggallery.po</li>
<li>Fixed:   Cache results of lookup_columns() to avoid multiple identical queries; thanks go to Alex Bradaric</li>
<li>Fixed:   Better WP-CPI detection</li>
<li>Fixed:   Removed unnecessary calls to parent::initialize()</li>
<li>Fixed:   Adjusted album-compact template to always include p.ngg-album-gallery-image-counter</li>
<li>Fixed:   Replaced empty gallery rendering in is_feed() with a link</li>
<li>Fixed:   Removed default settings for imagerotator, which is no longer supported</li>
<li>Fixed:   Optimizated scanning of images when importing a gallery</li>
<li>Fixed:   When a gallery is deleted, ensure that DB and filesystem are purged</li>
<li>Fixed:   Removed Insert Gallery Window box shadow</li>
<li>Fixed:   Ensure that file_exists() calls are prefixed with @</li>
</ul>

<h4>V2.1.0 - 05.18.2015</h4>

<ul>
<li>NEW:     Album breadcrumbs and pagination</li>
<li>NEW:     Ability to override builtin MVC templates</li>
<li>NEW:     Robust transient management</li>
<li>NEW:     Added the ability to set post thumbnails via XML-RPC module</li>
<li>NEW:     Added 'ngg_get_image_size_params' filter to control image generation</li>
<li>NEW:     Added 'ngg_basic_tagcloud_title' and 'ngg_basic_tagcloud_excluded_display_types' filters</li>
<li>NEW:     Added ngg_manage_images_items_per_page filter</li>
<li>NEW:     Added "ngg_get_image_url" filter</li>
<li>NEW:     Including Ukranian and Polish translations</li>
<li>NEW:     The ability to set template in widgets</li>
<li>Changed: Default thumbnail dimensions set to 240x160</li>
<li>Changed: Product now adheres to Pope 0.12 and provides get_modules_to_load()</li>
<li>Changed: Updated translations</li>
<li>Changed: Removed link to capsman plugin in Roles accordion</li>
<li>Changed: Taxnomies now use internationalized strings</li>
<li>Changed: Image date/time meta data fields are stored as UNIX timestamps</li>
<li>Secured: Uploading zips</li>
<li>Fixed:   Various PHP warnings and notices</li>
<li>Fixed:   Compatibility fixes for WPML</li>
<li>Fixed:   Ensure that backup image functionality fails gracefully</li>
<li>Fixed:   WP option 'ngg_do_upgrade' updated in every HTTP request</li>
<li>Fixed;   Empty $_SERVER['PATHINFO'] causing multiple routing issues</li>
<li>Fixed:   "Manage Galleries" display image alttext in the filename column</li>
<li>Fixed:   Various issues with the tag cloud display type</li>
<li>Fixed:   Integrity check when updating from 1.9.x</li>
<li>Fixed:   Image filenames substituting spaces for + which is only proper in the query string</li>
<li>Fixed:   Insert Gallery Window not working with nested levels of gzip compression</li>
<li>Fixed:   Imagebrowser as lightbox effect not working with pagination</li>
<li>Fixed:   Compatibility with MultiVerso Advanced File Sharing</li>
<li>Fixed:   "Add page" button not displaying on the next immediate page load</li>
<li>Fixed:   Double-escaping of non-latin characters</li>
<li>Fixed:   Imagebrowser pagination with custom templates</li>
<li>Fixed:   Custom CSS is enqueued late to ensure it's one of the last stylesheets loaded</li>
<li>Fixed:   Fixed watermarking PNG images</li>
<li>Fixed:   Using the "Import Metadata" bulk action overwrites existing data</li>
<li>Fixed:   Seconds were not retained from CaptureTime EXIF field</li>
<li>Fixed:   Conflicts created by our TinyMCE plugin</li>
<li>Fixed:   Image mapper setting gid to gallery name, not the unique ID</li>
<li>Fixed:   Restored nggdb-&#62;get_random_images(), nggdb-&#62;search_for_file, and nggdb-&#62;find_all_albums()</li>
<li>Fixed:   Allow gallery slug as parameter to nggdb::get_gallery()</li>
<li>Fixed:   Don't minify Plupload's i18n JavaScript</li>
<li>Fixed:   Custom template images not being given their full effect code attributes</li>
<li>Fixed:   When importing galleries from folders, allow symlinks</li>
<li>Fixed:   Use of C_Gallery_Mapper in C_Image_Wrapper</li>
<li>Fixed:   Properly handle themes that don't call wp_footer() or wp_print_footer_scripts()</li>
<li>Fixed:   Warning about missing style.php file on Network Admin -&#62; Gallery page</li>
<li>Fixed:   Warning about getimagesize() failure when backing up an image</li>
</ul>

<h4>v2.0.79 - 03.20.2015</h4>

<ul>
<li>Secured: Sanitized C_Displayed_Gallery-&#62;_add_find_in_set_column() third parameter</li>
</ul>

<h4>V2.0.78.1 - 03.12.2015</h4>

<ul>
<li>Changed: Image date/time meta data fields are stored as UNIX timestamps</li>
<li>Fixed:   When importing galleries from folders, allow symlinks</li>
<li>Fixed:   Use of C_Gallery_Mapper in C_Image_Wrapper</li>
<li>Fixed:   Properly handle themes that don't call wp_footer() or wp_print_footer_scripts()</li>
<li>Fixed:   Warning about missing style.php file on Network Admin -&#62; Gallery page</li>
<li>Fixed:   Warning about getimagesize() failure when backing up an image</li>
</ul>

<h4>V2.0.78 - 03.12.2015</h4>

<ul>
<li>Secured: AJAX actions for uploading images and importing folders now uses nonce checks</li>
</ul>

<h4>V2.0.77 - 03.05.2015</h4>

<ul>
<li>NEW:     Added "ngg_get_image_url" filter</li>
<li>Changed: Use a more reliable means of excluding Pro/Plus modules from using minified static resources</li>
<li>Fixed:   Imagebrowser pagination with custom templates</li>
<li>Fixed:   Custom CSS is enqueued late to ensure it's one of the last stylesheets loaded</li>
<li>Fixed:   Fixed watermarking PNG images</li>
<li>Fixed:   Using the "Import Metadata" bulk action overwrites existing data</li>
<li>Fixed:   Seconds were not retained from CaptureTime EXIF field</li>
<li>Fixed:   Conflicts created by our TinyMCE plugin</li>
<li>Fixed:   Image mapper setting gid to gallery name, not the unique ID</li>
<li>Fixed:   Restored nggdb-&#62;get_random_images(), nggdb-&#62;search_for_file, and nggdb-&#62;find_all_albums()</li>
<li>Fixed:   Allow gallery slug as parameter to nggdb::get_gallery()</li>
<li>Fixed:   Don't minify Plupload's i18n JavaScript</li>
<li>Fixed:   Custom template images not being given their full effect code attributes</li>
</ul>

<h4>V2.0.76 - 02.24.2015</h4>

<ul>
<li>Fixed:   Compatibility checks for very old versions of NextGEN Pro</li>
<li>Fixed:   Zero-byte downloads in WooCommerce and WPE-Commerce</li>
<li>Fixed:   Invalid URL being enqueued if a custom lightbox is selected with no URL provided</li>
<li>Fixed:   Restored a method to nggAdmin to fix compatibility with NextGen Public Uploader</li>
<li>Fixed:   Bug preventing source='recent' from displaying images in the correct order</li>
<li>Fixed:   Include more quotation symbols in our shortcode manager (foreign language shortcodes)</li>
<li>Fixed:   WPML/ATP compatibility issue</li>
<li>Fixed:   $nggdb-&#62;get_gallery() returning a different result than before</li>
</ul>

<h4>V2.0.74 - 02.20.2015</h4>

<ul>
<li>Changed: Removed jQuery Lightbox and Highslide due to incompatible licensing with GPL</li>
</ul>

<h4>V2.0.71 - 02.19.2015</h4>

<ul>
<li>NEW:     Module files are compiled into a single package file to reduce disk I/O</li>
<li>NEW:     All CSS stylesheets and Javascript source files are minified to reduce latency</li>
<li>NEW:     All lightboxes are configured using an in-memory management class.</li>
<li>NEW:     Uses Pope 2.0, benefiting from the new caching capabilities</li>
<li>NEW:     NextGEN Gallery's functionality is disabled if NextGEN Pro is incompatible</li>
<li>NEW:     Added ngg_effect_code filter</li>
<li>Changed: Updated FontAwesome to 4.3.0</li>
<li>Changed: Updated select2 to 3.5.2</li>
<li>Changed: Removed PicLens / CoolIris integration</li>
<li>Changed: Removed JSON API. Please use XML-RPC API instead</li>
<li>Changed: For performance reasons, we cache FS &#38; url lookups/calculations</li>
<li>Changed: Greatly reduced the # of sql queries, and eliminated anything redundant</li>
<li>Changed: For performance reasons, we cache datamapper and SQL queries</li>
<li>Changed: Don't enqueue scripts or styles unless we require them</li>
<li>Changed: Reduce the number of resources we enqueue for every HTTP request</li>
<li>Changed: Ngg_Store now uses cookies instead of localStorage</li>
<li>Changed: Insert Gallery Window is routed using wp-admin/admin_init</li>
<li>Changed: Removed unused code from ngglegacy module. Created wrappers for commonly-used functions</li>
<li>Changed: LZW module removed</li>
<li>Changed: Legacy template drop-down selection now using select2</li>
<li>Secured: Restrict folder browsing to NGG_IMPORT_ROOT constant</li>
<li>Fixed:   Compatibility issue with PHP's transparent ZLIB compression</li>
<li>Fixed:   Imagebrowser as lightbox effect not working when non-default permalink slug used</li>
<li>Fixed:   Angled quotations marks used in shortcode parameters</li>
<li>Fixed:   Compatibility between ImageBrowser display type and TwentyFifteen theme</li>
<li>Fixed:   Allow pagination to retain query string url parameters when linking to other pages</li>
<li>Fixed:   Fixed pagination issues with slideshow galleries displayed as thumbnails</li>
<li>Fixed:   Fix C_GalleryStorage_Driver_Base-&#62;import_gallery_from_fs() not checking imgBackup</li>
<li>Fixed:   Fixed problem with default settings being applied multiple times</li>
<li>Fixed:   Fallback to "full" image sizes if "backup" images aren't available</li>
<li>Fixed:   Use M_DataMapper's serialization methods throughout the codebase</li>
<li>Fixed:   Conflict with WordPress SEO and get_the_excerpt() call</li>
<li>Fixed:   Don't run Resource Manager on wp-login.php or wp-sign.php</li>
<li>Fixed:   TinyMCE Image Editor conflict with Insert Gallery Window placeholder images</li>
<li>Fixed:   Fix Shutter positioning when admin bar is displayed</li>
<li>Fixed:   Allow deselection of a legacy template</li>
<li>Fixed:   Prevent conflicts when using imagebrowser as a lightbox effect</li>
<li>Fixed:   Pagination not working for slideshows using thumbnail integration</li>
</ul>

<h4>V2.0.66.33 - 11.24.2014</h4>

<ul>
<li>Fixed:   Broken NextGEN Pro ecommerce-related shortcodes</li>
<li>Fixed:   Spanish PO file</li>
</ul>

<h4>V2.0.66.29 - 09.17.2014</h4>

<li>Fixed:   Adjust regex for replacing displayed gallery placeholder images</li>
<li>Fixed:   Removed filters to home_url needed previously for WMPL compatibility</li>
<li>Fixed:   Use canonical redirects when appropriate</li>
<li>Fixed:   Ability to override image files using XML-RPC</li>
</ul>

<ul>

<li>Changed: Moved some settings from DB to in-memory</li>
<li>Fixed:   Compatibility with BuddyPress plugin in multisite environments</li>
<li>Fixed:   Ability to find static resources outside of WP_PLUGIN_DIR</li>
<li>Fixed:   Autoupdate conflict with Photocrati Theme</li>
<li>Fixed:   Workaround GoDaddy's throttling of consecutive AJAX requests</li>
<li>Fixed:   Issue with settings manager in multisite enviroments</li>
</ul>

<li>Secured: XSS vulnerability on Manage Albums page</li>
</ul>

<h4>V2.0.66.16 - 07.30.2014</h4>

<ul>
<li>NEW:     Added new "limit" setting to Slideshow widgets</li>
<li>NEW:     Added a "ngg_routes" action for other plugins to hook into to provide new routes</li>
<li>NEW:     Added NGG_SKIP_LOAD_SCRIPTS constant, which existed in 1.9.x</li>
<li>NEW:     Added NGG_GALLERY_ROOT_TYPE constant. Set to 'content' to load galleries from the content_dir / content_url</li>
<li>NEW:     Bosnian (bs_BA) language thanks to Nevesin Srdoc</li>
<li>NEW:     Chinese (zh_CN) language thanks to Vahi Chen, <a href="http://www.vahichen.com" rel="nofollow">http://www.vahichen.com</a></li>
<li>NEW:     Dutch (nl_NL) language thanks to Taeke Kooiker</li>
<li>NEW:     Filipino (fil) language thanks to Find Hold, <a href="http://www.findhold.dk/" rel="nofollow">http://www.findhold.dk/</a></li>
<li>NEW:     French (fr_FR) language thanks to Jean-Yves Dumaine &#38; Le Blog de Lise</li>
<li>NEW:     Hungarian (hu_HU) language thanks to Zolt&#225;n Varanka</li>
<li>NEW:     Italian (it_IT) language thanks to Jacopo Caggiano, @tizz</li>
<li>NEW:     Russian (ru_RU) language thanks to SnakeD3</li>
<li>NEW:     Spanish (es_ES) language thanks to Andrew Kurtis at WebHostingHub</li>
<li>Changed: Updated Czech language thanks to Separatista; additional thanks to Martin Krizek for the original translation who was mistakenly unaccredited</li>
<li>Changed: "Upgrade to Pro" page has new design, advertises for NextGEN Plus</li>
<li>Changed: Basic Albums templates now given the image counter P element the class 'ngg-album-gallery-image-counter' (by user request)</li>
<li>Changed: Gallery widgets now apply height:auto to their element; fixes compatibility with some themes</li>
<li>Changed: Random galleries should be substantially faster now (1000% or more for large image tables)</li>
<li>Fixed:   Complete WPML compatibility</li>
<li>Fixed:   Disable Buddypress 'bp_do_redirect_canonical' filter as it ruins our routing system</li>
<li>Fixed:   Use plugins_url() content_url() when appropriate rather than just site_url() and home_url()</li>
<li>Fixed:   WP Cron job will remove not only displayed gallery transients, but rendering transients as well</li>
<li>Fixed:   NGG_RENDERING_CACHE_TTL constant is honored properly</li>
<li>Fixed:   If using the caption template for Basic Thumbnails, only show the image caption when appropriate</li>
<li>Fixed:   If NGG is uninstalled, so are it's custom capabilities</li>
<li>Fixed:   Translate "Attach NextGEN Gallery to Post" ATP icon alt text when translations are active</li>
<li>Fixed:   Multisite gallery path tooltip gave a wrong default setting</li>
<li>Fixed:   Flush 'all' caches when pope_module_list setting changes</li>
<li>Fixed:   Don't enqueue related images css in the admin</li>
<li>Fixed:   Basic Slideshows fixes WP creating extraneous P element above the slideshow display</li>
<li>Fixed:   Basic Singlepic will now display images marked 'excluded' in the admin</li>
<li>Fixed:   Admin pages can now update when the "Save" button text has been translated</li>
</ul>

<h4>V2.0.63 - 04.29.2014</h4>

<li>Changed: Moved jquery.nextgen_radio_toggle.js to NextGEN Admin Module</li>
<li>Changed: Original display settings are passed to secondary display types</li>
<li>Fixed:   Thumbnail dimension calculations are inaccurate by 1px when maintaining aspect ratio</li>
<li>Fixed:   Copy IPTC data from original to new image when creating new sizes / thumbnails</li>
<li>Fixed:   Use correct absolute path when importing images in a multisite environment</li>
<li>Fixed:   Incorrect display of disk space quotas in multisite environments</li>
<li>Fixed:   Removed redundant roles form in multisite environments</li>
<li>Fixed:   Insert Gallery Window support for multisite environments</li>
<li>Fixed:   Incorrect handling of NextGEN Styles in multisite environments</li>
<li>Fixed:   Not honouring NGG_IMPORT_ROOT constant</li>
<li>Fixed:   Fixed inability to edit gallery properties using XMLRPC's edit_gallery method</li>
<li>Fixed:   Alignment issues in Basic Compact Albums caused by subalbums not displaying image 'counter'</li>
<li>Fixed:   Display setting forms compatibility issue with WordPress 3.9</li>
<li>Fixed;   Compability with jQuery Dialogs in WordPress 3.9</li>
<li>Fixed:   Maximum entity code should be a displayed gallery property for recent/random sources only</li>
<li>Fixed:   Problems with zlib compression: <a href="https://core.trac.wordpress.org/ticket/18525" rel="nofollow">https://core.trac.wordpress.org/ticket/18525</a></li>
<li>Fixed:   Support for web servers which use a document root of '//'</li>
<li>Fixed:   Compatibility with WPML Translation Management</li>
<li>Fixed:   use 'del' for function name in ngg_store.js, 'delete' is a reserved keyword</li>
<li>Fixed:   Enqueue fontawesome only when necessary</li>
<li>Fixed:   Suhosin compatibility issue when overriding PHP memory limit</li>
<li>Fixed:   Handle images of wrong image type correctly when trying to create cropped thumbnails</li>
<li>Fixed:   Datamapper entities not allowed to have properties with a value of 0</li>
<li>Fixed:   Resource manager is manipulating feeds</li>
<li>Fixed:   Convert absolute urls to relative urls for lightboxes</li>
<li>Fixed:   Start the resource manager as early as we can within the init action</li>
<li>Fixed:   Routing problem for galleries with images named 1.jpg, 2.jpg, 3.jpg, etc.</li>
<li>Fixed:   Added tooltips to basic slideshow settings</li>
<li>Fixed:   Remove CKEditor's NextGEN button, which is incompatible with NextGEN Gallery 2.x</li>
</ul>

<h4>V2.0.57 - 03.05.2014</h4>

<ul>
<li>NEW:     Re-introduced the Reset button</li>
<li>NEW:     Tooltip added for Page Link to functionality</li>
<li>NEW:     Displayed Gallery Triggers moved from NextGEN Pro to NextGEN Gallery (not in use)</li>
<li>NEW:     Added NGG_Store, a client-side persistence layer (not in use)</li>
<li>NEW:     Added NGG_CRON_SCHEDULE constant. Set to the number of seconds between the execution of NextGEN Gallery cron jobs</li>
<li>NEW:     Added NGG_RENDERING_CACHE_TTL constant. TTL measured in seconds.</li>
<li>NEW:     Added NGG_DISPLAYED_GALLERY_CACHE_TTL constant. TTL measured in seconds.</li>
<li>NEW:     Added NGG_DISABLE_LEGACY_SHORTCODES constant. When TRUE, [slideshow] becomes [nggslideshow].</li>
<li>NEW:     Added Font Awesome, available for NextGEN Gallery extensions</li>
<li>Changed: Transients are removed every 30 minutes instead of 60 minutes</li>
<li>Changed: Admin Page &#38; Form components refactored to allow custom POST processing</li>
<li>Changed: Default path for NEW multisite installations to wp-content/uploads/sites/%BLOG_ID%/nggallery/</li>
<li>Fixed:   Ability to upload ZIP files on Windows hosts</li>
<li>Fixed:   Support for filenames with non-ASCII characters</li>
<li>Fixed:   Dynamic updates in the Attach to Post interface (interframe communication)</li>
<li>Fixed:   Attach to Post interface freezing in IE11</li>
<li>Fixed:   Path issues on Windows Servers</li>
<li>Fixed:   Module installer integrity</li>
<li>Fixed:   Database query performance. No more joins to the WP options table</li>
<li>Fixed:   Lightboxes storing absolute paths for static resources</li>
<li>Fixed:   Displayed gallery cache not regularly flushed</li>
<li>Fixed:   SQL query performance problems. Honor max_packet_allowed variable for MySQL</li>
<li>Fixed:   Multiple database queries generated for determining next available image slug</li>
<li>Fixed:   Corrupted MediaRSS feeds</li>
<li>Fixed:   Padding on Gallery Settings and Other Options pages</li>
<li>Fixed:   Routing issues on subdirectory installs</li>
<li>Fixed:   Importing galleries using the Attach to Post Interface</li>
<li>Fixed:   Gallery path calculations on Windows web servers</li>
<li>Fixed:   Sub-album urls not processed correctly</li>
<li>Fixed:   Apply maximum entity count to existing displayed galleries</li>
<li>Fixed:   NextGEN Gallery Thumbnail Widget shouldn't use ImageBrowser effect</li>
<li>Fixed:   Ability to set shuffle parameter for ImageRotator slideshows</li>
<li>Fixed:   PHP warning about HTMLDocument when displaying a SinglePic</li>
<li>Fixed:   Sanitization of gallery title</li>
<li>Fixed:   Home URL now used instead of Site URL in MediaRSS feed</li>
<li>Fixed:   Attach to Post interface broken when WPML is installed</li>
<li>Fixed:   Attach to Post interface instructing browser to cache the page</li>
<li>Fixed:   Watermarking not working in low-memory environments</li>
<li>Fixed:   Maximum images limit not being applied for galleries already created.</li>
<li>Fixed:   Double forward slashes in static urls</li>
<li>Fixed:   Don't sleep when checking if the installer is running</li>
<li>Fixed:   Don't enforce Pope interface contracts</li>
<li>Fixed:   Remove custom table extra records from wp_options table</li>
<li>Fixed:   Scan folder for new images not working</li>
<li>Fixed:   Incorrect page permalink used for "Page Link To" functionality</li>
<li>Fixed:   Pagination broken when Basic Thumbnail gallery on the same page as Basic Album</li>
<li>Fixed:   parse_url() warnings generated for PHP 5.3.3 and earlier</li>
<li>Fixed:   Compatibility with Headway Themes</li>
<li>Fixed:   Compatibility with web servers which don't provide PHP a document root</li>
<li>Fixed:   Third-party incompatibilities caused by the Photocrati Resource Manager</li>
<li>Fixed:   Compatibility with the Flattr plugin</li>
<li>Fixed:   Compatibility with the Weaver II theme</li>
<li>Fixed:   Interface tweaks for WordPress 3.8</li>
</ul>

<h4>V2.0.40 - 11.26.2013</h4>

<ul>
<li>NEW:     Added the ability to apply lightbox effects to non-NGG images</li>
<li>NEW:     Added NGG_HIDE_STRICT_ERRORS constant. Define and set to TRUE to hide strict errors</li>
<li>NEW:     Added NGG_IMPORT_ROOT constant. Define and set to TRUE to browse from a custom directory</li>
<li>NEW:     Added NGG_DEBUG constant. Define and set to TRUE to display helpful messages for debugging</li>
<li>NEW:     Each custom table record will have an associated custom post record for expansion</li>
<li>NEW:     Display helpful error messages when there's a problem uploading images</li>
<li>NEW:     Add data-(src&#124;thumbnail&#124;image-id&#124;title&#124;description) attribute to gallery image anchors</li>
<li>NEW:     Variant support for displayed gallery sources. Random images is limited to 5 variations</li>
<li>Fixed:   Excessive creation of transients for random galleries</li>
<li>Fixed:   Many issues prohibiting the ability to upload images</li>
<li>Fixed:   Compatibility with NextGEN Gallery Export Plugin for Adobe Lightroom (thanks Vladimir!)</li>
<li>Fixed:   Sorting in the Attach to Post interface</li>
<li>Fixed:   HTML allowed in gallery/album descriptions</li>
<li>Fixed:   Requests for galleries within albums that have numeric names are broken</li>
<li>Fixed:   Call to a non-member function get() on WP_Query</li>
<li>Fixed:   Ability to sort by Image ID in the Attach to Post interface</li>
<li>Fixed:   Isolate the Attach to Post from implicit third-party script inclusion</li>
<li>Fixed:   Check for the existance of thumbnails when generating urls, and if missing, generate new ones</li>
<li>Fixed:   Compatibility with NextGEN Facebook OpenGraph+ plugin</li>
<li>Fixed:   Various XML-RPC issues</li>
<li>Fixed:   Widgets stylesheet not included</li>
<li>Fixed:   Issue with color not being pre-selected when previewing Watermark</li>
<li>Fixed:   E_NOTICE emitted when cleaning up cached image files</li>
<li>Fixed:   E_NOTICE emitted when viewing display type settings</li>
<li>Fixed:   Typo adjusting pcre.backtrack_limit for shortcodes</li>
<li>Fixed:   Content within the tabs of the Attach to Post interface cut-off</li>
<li>Fixed:   Routing problem which would cause conflicts with different display types on the same page</li>
<li>Fixed:   Broken Dynamic CSS links on GoDaddy</li>
<li>Fixed:   Ability to use HTML in gallery/album descriptions</li>
<li>Fixed:   Sub-album requests conflicting with paginated galleries on the same page</li>
<li>Merged:  Pull request from andreasE (<a href="https://bitbucket.org/photocrati/nextgen-gallery/pull-request/6/" rel="nofollow">https://bitbucket.org/photocrati/nextgen-gallery/pull-request/6/</a>)</li>
</ul>

<li>NEW:     Requests /ngg_tag/[tagname] will create a displayed gallery</li>

<li>Fixed:   Pagination conflicts for multiple Imagebrowsers on the same page</li>
<li>Fixed:   Ability to display previous exception with debug mode</li>
<li>Fixed:   Tagclouds not working in multisite instances</li>
<li>Fixed:   Load widgets.css when a widget is being used</li>
<li>Fixed:   Installer should remove all instances of the component factory</li>

<li>Fixed:   Only display rendering errors if WP_DEBUG is enabled</li>
</ul>

<li>Fixed:   Adjusted Photocrati Resource Manager to be third-party friendly</li>

<li>Fixed:   URL generation for imagebrowser pagination links</li>
<li>Fixed:   Ensure that image meta is imported on creation</li>
<li>Fixed:   Ensure that transients are removed when an external object cache is used</li>
<li>Fixed:   Don't load pluggable.php. This will fix plugin conflicts</li>
<li>Fixed:   In Attach to Post interface, galleries created in one tab weren't showing in another</li>
<li>Fixed:   Don't output frame events cookie for XML-RPC requests</li>
</ul>

<h4>V2.0.25 - 09.18.2013</h4>

<ul>
<li>Reverting to the 2.0.21 codebase, due to major performance issues in 2.0.23 and 2.0.24</li>
</ul>

<h4>V2.0.23 - 09.16.2013</h4>

<ul>
<li>NEW:     WP-Cron job to periodically clean-up displayed gallery transients</li>
<li>NEW:     Added "excluded_container_ids" as parameter for ngg_images shortcode</li>
<li>Fixed:   Lightbox effect is honoured by all display types</li>
<li>Fixed:   Highslide displays images from the correct displayed galleries</li>
<li>Fixed:   Ensure that sub-albums display correctly when the word "album" is part of a slug</li>
<li>Fixed:   Ensure that sub-albums display correctly when numerical slugs are used</li>
<li>Fixed:   Related images heading only added when Related Images functionality is enabled</li>
<li>Fixed:   PHP Warning about undefined index when viewing basic albums</li>
<li>Fixed:   AJAX handling is third-party compatible</li>
<li>Fixed:   Image date is no longer overwritten when an image is modified</li>
<li>Fixed:   Fixed issue with displayed galleries using source='tags'</li>
<li>Fixed:   Problem with transient cache not getting flushed properly from Other Options page</li>
<li>Fixed:   Use correct gallery/transient ID when ajax pagination is used</li>
</ul>

<h4>V2.0.21 - 09.09.2013</h4>

<ul>
<li>NEW:     Multisite support</li>
<li>Changed: Default image quality set to 100 for generated images</li>
<li>Changed: Removed dependence on simplehtmldom library</li>
<li>Fixed:   Related images functionality works as it did in 1.9.x</li>
<li>Fixed:   Don't compress inline JavaScript in post/page content</li>
<li>Fixed:   Click-to-advance slideshow behavior for slideshows</li>
<li>Fixed:   Security warnings from VaultPress</li>
<li>Fixed:   View as Slideshow link works with AJAX pagination</li>
<li>Fixed:   Broken links on Overview page</li>
<li>Fixed:   Backup images option</li>
<li>Fixed:   Stylesheet url generated correctly for Windows hosts</li>
<li>Fixed:   Compatibility with NextGen Custom Fields plugin</li>
<li>Fixed:   Compatibility with Adsense Explosion plugin</li>
<li>Fixed:   Suppress wp_footer notices unless WP_DEBUG is set to TRUE</li>
</ul>

<h4>V2.0.17 - 08.30.2013</h4>

<p>Fixed:     Match legacy behaviour when changing gallery path, i.e. don't move files</p>

<h4>V2.0.14 - 08.27.2013</h4>

<ul>
<li>NEW:     Added the ability to override thumbnail settings for NextGEN Basic Albums</li>
<li>NEW:     Shortcode Manager API, which ensures that shortcodes are outputted as intended</li>
<li>Changed: Re-added the ability to select the original image size for widgets</li>
<li>Fixed:   Ensure that stylesheet url returned is correct for Windows hosts</li>
<li>Fixed:   Broken links and lightbox effects with AJAX pagination</li>
<li>Fixed:   Try to ensure that third party plugins don't add content to our dynamic JS</li>
<li>Fixed:   Improved reliability of iframely.js</li>
<li>Fixed:   Ensure that urls are generated correctly in HTTPs environments</li>
<li>Fixed:   Datamapper works correctly in environments where temporary tables aren't supported</li>
<li>Fixed:   Fixed an issue with thickbox loading animation when home url differs from site url</li>
</ul>

<h4>V2.0.11 - 08.19.2013</h4>

<ul>
<li>NEW:     Added "run_ngg_resource_manager" hook to by-pass our resource manager</li>
<li>Changed: Removed "Reset &#38; Uninstall" tab, for now</li>
<li>Fixed:   Compatibility with W3 Total Cache. Please flush cache after updating.</li>
<li>Fixed:   Conflicts with Photocrati Theme Galleries</li>
<li>Fixed:   Blank Attach to Post interface window</li>
<li>Fixed:   Fixed ability to change Lightbox Effect settings</li>
<li>Fixed:   Implemented techniques to ensure WP_Query variables aren't overwritten</li>
<li>Fixed:   Enqueuing AJAX JS libraries twice in wp-admin</li>
<li>Fixed:   Encoding issues</li>
<li>Fixed:   PHP warnings caused by accessing unserialized data as array</li>
<li>Fixed:   Fixed installer issues</li>
</ul>

<h4>V2.0.7 - 08.09.2013</h4>

<ul>
<li>NEW:     New resource manager that fixes many plugin and theme incompatibilities</li>
<li>NEW:     Styles (custom stylesheets) should reside in wp-content/ngg_styles</li>
<li>NEW:     Added option to "Other Options -&#62; Misc" to control maximum images returned</li>
<li>Secured: Removed default connector for jQuery FileTree library</li>
<li>Changed: Updated the simplehtmldom library to version 1.5</li>
<li>Changed: jQuery is now enqueued at the beginning of every request</li>
<li>Fixed:   Incompatibilities with BuddyPress</li>
<li>Fixed:   Incompatibilities with Events+, bbPress, Custom Permalinks, and many other plugins</li>
<li>Fixed:   Incompcatibilities with Member Access, AMember, Magic Fields, and More Fields</li>
<li>Fixed:   Incompatibilities with Elegant Themes, Oxygen, Responsive, and many other themes</li>
<li>Fixed:   Ensure that gallery images don't have a border by default</li>
<li>Fixed:   Conflict between imagebrowser and album urls</li>
<li>Fixed:   Reverted default gallerypath to wp-content/gallery/</li>
<li>Fixed:   Upgrade-safe way of overriding Styles</li>
<li>Fixed:   Generation of AJAX url is now based on slug</li>
<li>Fixed:   Restore nggShowGallery and nggShowSlideshow as wrappers to new API</li>
<li>Fixed:   Always use domain as specified by WordPress Site URL</li>
<li>Fixed:   Use WordPress Home URL over Site URL when appropriate</li>
<li>Fixed:   Numerous pagination issues</li>
<li>Fixed:   Adjusted our forms to comply with WordPress Firewalls</li>
<li>Fixed:   Correct use of select2 DOM selector for maximum compatibility</li>
<li>Fixed:   Path and URL calculations for Windows and UNIX environments</li>
<li>Fixed:   Ensure that pluggable.php is loaded at the start of every request</li>
<li>Fixed:   Fancybox: adjust CSS for further box-sizing protection from themes</li>
<li>Fixed:   Use PHP 5.2.1 compatible named pattern matching syntax</li>
<li>Fixed:   Remove usage of <strong>DIR</strong> constant not supported by PHP 5.2.x</li>
<li>Fixed:   Removed dependency on mb_string PHP module</li>
<li>Fixed:   Allow "No Lightbox" as an option for Lightbox Effects</li>
<li>Fixed:   Warning: "Invalid CRT parameters detected" for Windows environments</li>
</ul>

<h4>V2.0 - 07.30.2013</h4>

<ul>
<li>NEW:     Improved user experience throughout the plugin, settings and usage.</li>
<li>NEW:     Plupload queue uploader that allows for bulk and zip uploads within the same interface.</li>
<li>NEW:     Complete redesign of the NextGEN options panel</li>
<li>NEW:     Added new interface for adding galleries from pages and posts.</li>
<li>NEW:     Galleries are now mobile friendly and responsive, which is most noticeable with a responsive theme.</li>
<li>NEW:     Streamlined functionality for displaying galleries based on tags.</li>
<li>NEW:     Architecture based on Pope Framework (<a href="http://bitbucket.org/photocrati/pope-framework" rel="nofollow">http://bitbucket.org/photocrati/pope-framework</a>)</li>
<li>NEW:     New shortcode, &#8220;ngg_images&#8221;, and corresponding Attach to Post interface</li>
<li>NEW:     Galleries have now global and instance settings</li>
<li>NEW:     Support for FastCGI environments</li>
<li>Changed: Replaces shortcodes with placeholder images, however still supports legacy shortcodes.</li>
<li>Changed: Introduced new Growl-like notifications</li>
<li>Changed: The container and it&#8217;s images are centered for slideshows</li>
<li>Changed: NextGEN styles now override vs replace default styles</li>
<li>Changed: NextGEN legacy templates have been deprecated (but still function)</li>
<li>FIXED:   The ability to use NextGEN image as a Featured Image.</li>
<li>FIXED:   Many bugs and annoyances, such as PHP warnings, errors, etc.</li>
</ul>

<h4>V1.9.13 - 06.11.2013</h4>

<ul>
<li>NEW:     Slideshows are now centered to their content area</li>
<li>Secured: Ensure that only logged in users can upload images</li>
<li>Fixed:   Import date is presered are no longer Jan 1 1970</li>
<li>Fixed:   Removed mention of upgrade.php, which no longer exists</li>
</ul>

<h4>V1.9.12 - 02.15.2013</h4>

<ul>
<li>Fixed:   jQuery Conflict Detection was trying to dequeue irremovable scripts</li>
</ul>

<h4>V1.9.11 - 02.12.2013</h4>

<ul>
<li>NEW: Added the ability to detect JQuery conflicts on NGG Admin Pages and auto-resolve</li>
<li>Changed: Added "nggalbum" shortcode. Use this when Jetpack is installed.</li>
<li>Changed: Using natural sorting algorithm for alphanumeric values</li>
<li>Changed: Database schema is automatically updated when out-of-date</li>
<li>Fixed:   Fixed several incompatibility issues with Jetpack</li>
<li>Fixed:   Empty drop-down for "Page Link To"</li>
<li>Fixed:   Alphabetical image sorting</li>
<li>Fixed:   Compatibility with Arjuna X theme</li>
<li>Fixed:   &#226;&#8364;&#339;Creating default object from empty value&#226;&#8364; on album page</li>
<li>Fixed:   Compatibility issues with PHP 5.4 on album page</li>
<li>Fixed:   E_DEPRECATED warning when using get_userdatabylogin() function</li>
<li>Fixed:   Removed many E_NOTICE errors</li>
<li>Fixed:   Correct use of register_uninstall_hook across all PHP versions</li>
</ul>

<h4>V1.9.10 - 12.18.2012</h4>

<ul>
<li>Fixed:   XML-RPC error displayed when authenticating using WordPress 3.5</li>
<li>Fixed:   Restored compatibility with NextGEN Gallery Export Plugin</li>
<li>Fixed:   Removed some remaining references to database upgrade code</li>
<li>Fixed:   Deleted galleries within an album are handed gracefully without warning messages</li>
<li>Fixed:   Correct use of register_uninstall_hook</li>
<li><p>Fixed:   CSS and usability issues with the TinyMCE window used to display galleries</p></li>
<li><p>NEW:     JW ImageRotator v3.17 is now bundled with the plugin and used by default.</p></li>
<li>Changed: Removed database upgrade code for versions of NextGEN Gallery earlier than 1.9.3</li>
<li>Fixed:   Compatibility with WordPress v3.5 ( wpdb-&#62;prepare()";s:3:"faq";s:3308:"<h4>Why are my galleries not opening up in a lightbox after I move my site?</h4>

<p>This is often due to the URL paths to the CSS and JavaScript files used by the Lightbox Effects not being changed to relevant addresses based on the new site. This article will help sort out this issue if that is the case: <a href="https://www.imagely.com/docs/galleries-opening-lightbox/">Why are my galleries not opening up in a lightbox?</a>.</p>

<h4>Do you have documentation or tutorials?</h4>

<p>Yes. See <a href="https://www.imagely.com/docs/nextgen-gallery/">NextGEN Gallery Documentation</a>.</p>

<h4>Will NextGEN Gallery work with my theme?</h4>

<p>Part of what makes the NextGEN Gallery WordPress gallery plugin so popular is its flexibility - it works with the vast majority of premium and free themes, without requiring any coding.</p>

<h4>Are the galleries flash based?</h4>

<p>No, NextGEN Gallery uses Javascript (J-Query) based displays to ensure compatibility across the widest range of displays possible.</p>

<h4>Are the galleries mobile friendly?</h4>

<p>Yes, since we use Javascript rather than flash, NextGEN Gallery is compatible with Android, iOS, and Blackberry. As of July 2013, all galleries are responsive. NextGEN Pro also includes a full screen, responsive Pro Lightbox with mobile gesture support.</p>

<h4>What is the difference between a gallery and an album?</h4>

<p>In the simplest of terms, Galleries contain your images and Albums contain your Galleries. Albums act as links and placeholders to quickly and easily navigate your galleries - Galleries will actually display your images.</p>

<h4>Can I upload multiple images at once?</h4>

<p>Yes, you can batch upload entire galleries at a time.</p>

<h4>Can I password protect galleries?</h4>

<p>Yes, WordPress allows you to password protect pages by default - which includes all galleries and content for the entire page. Password protection of pages can be turned on and off at any time, with just a few clicks.</p>

<h4>Can I add a watermark to the images/slideshows?</h4>

<p>Yes, you can add text or image watermarks to your gallery images.</p>

<h4>Can I crop thumbnails?</h4>

<p>Yes, each thumbnail image can be individually adjusted to suit your needs.</p>

<h4>Is there pagination for galleries?</h4>

<p>Yes, and you can adjust the amount of images to be shown on a page at any time.</p>

<h4>Can I customize the lightbox?</h4>

<p>Yes, the lightbox can be configured with multiple options directly from the Dashboard, and there are multiple CSS styles which can be applied and modified as well.</p>

<h4>Can I add HTML to the captions?</h4>

<p>Yes, caption areas are fully HMTL capable.</p>

<h4>Can I add an external links to galleries?</h4>

<p>Since the captions are fully HTML capable, you can add external links and any other type of mark up you wish.</p>

<h4>Is NextGEN Gallery available in foreign languages?</h4>

<p>Yes, the NextGEN Gallery WordPress gallery plugin has been translated into dozens of languages - <a href="https://www.imagely.com/languages/">click here to find out more.</a></p>

<h4>More Information</h4>

<p>For more information, feel free to visit the official website for the NextGEN Gallery <a href="https://www.imagely.com/wordpress-gallery-plugin">WordPress Gallery Plugin</a>.</p>";}s:17:"short_description";s:121:"The most popular WordPress gallery plugin and one of the most popular plugins of all time with over 16 million Thumbnails allows you to regenerate the thumbnails for your image attachments. This is very handy if you've changed any of your thumbnail dimensions (via Settings -&#62; Media) after previously uploading images or have changed to a theme with different featured post image dimensions.</p>

<p>You can either regenerate the thumbnails for all image uploads, individual image uploads, or specific multiple image uploads.</p>

<p>See the <a href="http://wordpress.org/extend/plugins/regenerate-thumbnails/screenshots/">screenshots tab</a> for more details.</p>";s:12:"installation";s:184:"<ol>

<li>Click activate.</li>

<ul>
<li>PHP 7 compatibility.</li>
</ul>

<h4>Version 2.2.5</h4>

<ul>
<li>Updates relating to plugin language pack support.</li>
</ul>

<h4>Version 2.2.4</h4>

<ul>
<li>Better AJAX response error handling in the JavaScript. This should fix a long-standing bug in this plugin. Props Hew Sutton.</li>
</ul>

<h4>Version 2.2.3</h4>

<ul>
<li>Make the capability required to use this plugin filterable so themes and other plugins can change it. Props <a href="http://jacksonwhelan.com/">Jackson Whelan</a>.</li>
</ul>

<h4>Version 2.2.2</h4>

<ul>
<li>Don't check the nonce until we're sure that the action called was for this plugin. Fixes lots of "Are you sure you want to do this?" error messages.</li>
</ul>

<h4>Version 2.2.1</h4>

<ul>
<li>Fix the bottom bulk action dropdown. Thanks Stefan for pointing out the issue!</li>
</ul>

<h4>Version 2.2.0</h4>

<ul>
<li>Changes to the Bulk Action functionality were made shortly before the release of WordPress 3.1 which broke the way I implemented the specific multiple image regeneration feature. This version adds to the Bulk Action menu using Javascript as that's the only way to do it currently.</li>
</ul>

<h4>Version 2.1.3</h4>

<ul>
<li>Move the <code>error_reporting()</code> call in the AJAX handler to the beginning so that we're more sure that no PHP errors are outputted. Some hosts disable usage of <code>set_time_limit()</code> and calling it was causing a PHP warning to be outputted.</li>
</ul>

<h4>Version 2.1.2</h4>

<ul>
<li>When regenerating all images, newest images are done first rather than the oldest.</li>
<li>Fixed a bug with regeneration error reporting in some browsers. Thanks to pete-sch for reporting the error.</li>
<li>Supress PHP errors in the AJAX handler to avoid sending an invalid JSON response. Thanks to pete-sch for reporting the error.</li>
<li>Better and more detailed error reporting for when <code>wp_generate_attachment_metadata()</code> fails.</li>
</ul>

<h4>Version 2.1.1</h4>

<ul>
<li>Clean up the wording a bit to better match the new features and just be easier to understand.</li>
<li>Updated screenshots.</li>
</ul>

<h4>Version 2.1.0</h4>

<p>Lots of new features!</p>

<ul>
<li>Thanks to a lot of jQuery help from <a href="http://borisschapira.com/">Boris Schapira</a>, a failed image regeneration will no longer stop the whole process.</li>
<li>The results of each image regeneration is now outputted. You can easily see which images were successfully regenerated and which failed. Was inspired by a concept by Boris.</li>
<li>There is now a button on the regeneration page that will allow you to abort resizing images for any reason. Based on code by Boris.</li>
<li>You can now regenerate single images from the Media page. The link to do so will show up in the actions list when you hover over the row.</li>
<li>You can now bulk regenerate multiple from the Media page. Check the boxes and then select "Regenerate Thumbnails" form the "Bulk Actions" dropdown. WordPress 3.1+ only.</li>
<li>The total time that the regeneration process took is now displayed in the final status message.</li>
<li>jQuery UI Progressbar version upgraded.</li>
</ul>

<h4>Version 2.0.3</h4>

<ul>
<li>Switch out deprecated function call.</li>
</ul>

<h4>Version 2.0.2</h4>

<ul>
<li>Directly query the database to only fetch what the plugin needs (the attachment ID). This will reduce the memory required as it's not storing the whole row for each attachment.</li>
</ul>

<h4>Version 2.0.1</h4>

<ul>
<li>I accidentally left a <code>check_admin_referer()</code> (nonce check) commented out.</li>
</ul>

<h4>Version 2.0.0</h4>

<ul>
<li>Recoded from scratch. Now uses an AJAX request per attachment to do the resizing. No more PHP maximum execution time errors or anything like that. Also features a pretty progress bar to let the user know how it's going.</li>
</ul>

<h4>Version 1.1.0</h4>

<ul>
<li>WordPress 2.7 updates -- code + UI. Thanks to jdub and Patrick F.</li>
</ul>

<h4>Version 1.0.0</h4>

<ul>
<li>Initial release.</li>
</ul>";}s:17:"short_description";s:76:"Allows you to regenerate your thumbnails after changing the thumbnail sizes.";s:13:"download_link";s:64:"https://downloads.wordpress.org/plugin/regenerate-thumbnails.zip";s:4:"tags";a:2:{s:9:"thumbnail";s:9:"thumbnail";s:10:"thumbnails";s:10:"thumbnails";}s:11:"donate_link";s:35:"http://www.viper007bond.com/donate/";s:5:"icons";a:1:{s:7:"default";s:16178:"data:image/svg+xml;base64,";}}s:14:"contact-form-7";O:8:"stdClass":22:{s:4:"name";s:14:"Contact Form 7";s:4:"slug";s:14:"contact-form-7";s:7:"version";s:3:"4.6";s:6:"author";s:61:"<a href="http://ideasilo.wordpress.com/">Takayuki Miyoshi</a>";s:14:"author_profile";s:43:"https://profiles.wordpress.org/takayukister";s:12:"contributors";a:1:{s:12:"takayukister";s:43:"https://profiles.wordpress.org/takayukister";}s:8:"requires";s:3:"4.5";s:6:"tested";s:5:"4.7.1";s:13:"compatibility";a:0:{}s:6:"rating";d:90;s:11:"num_ratings";s:4:"1074";s:7:"ratings";a:5:{i:5;s:3:"852";i:4;s:2:"91";i:3;s:2:"28";i:2;s:2:"21";i:1;s:2:"82";}s:10:"downloaded";i:45592593;s:12:"last_updated";s:22:"2016-12-03 11:46pm GMT";s:5:"added";s:10:"2007-08-02";s:8:"homepage";s:24:"http://contactform7.com/";s:8:"sections";a:5:{s:11:"description";s:2142:"<p>Contact Form 7 can manage multiple contact forms, plus you can customize the form and the mail contents flexibly with simple markup. The form supports Ajax-powered submitting, CAPTCHA, Akismet spam filtering and so on.</p>

<h4>Docs &#38; Support</h4>

<p>You can find <a href="http://contactform7.com/docs/">docs</a>, <a href="http://contactform7.com/faq/">FAQ</a> and more detailed information about Contact Form 7 on <a href="http://contactform7.com/">contactform7.com</a>. If you were unable to find the answer to your question on the FAQ or in any of the documentation, you should check the <a href="http://wordpress.org/support/plugin/contact-form-7">support forum</a> on WordPress.org. If you can't locate any topics that pertain to your particular issue, post a new topic for it.</p>

<h4>Contact Form 7 Needs Your Support</h4>

<p>It is hard to continue development and support for this free plugin without contributions from users like you. If you enjoy using Contact Form 7 and find it useful, please consider <a href="http://contactform7.com/donate/"><strong>making a donation</strong></a>. Your donation will help encourage and support the plugin's continued development and better user support.</p>

<h4>Recommended Plugins</h4>

<p>The following plugins are recommended for Contact Form 7 users:</p>

<ul>
<li><a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/flamingo/">Flamingo</a> by Takayuki Miyoshi - With Flamingo, you can save submitted messages via contact forms in the database.</li>
<li><a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/postman-smtp/">Postman</a> by
Jason Hendriks - Postman is a next-generation SMTP Mailer, software that assists in the delivery of email generated by your WordPress site.</li>
<li><a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/bogo/">Bogo</a> by Takayuki Miyoshi - Bogo is a straight-forward multilingual plugin that doesn't cause headaches.</li>
</ul>

<h4>Translations</h4>

<p>You can <a href="http://contactform7.com/translating-contact-form-7/">translate Contact Form 7</a> on <a href="https://translate.wordpress.org/projects/wp-plugins/contact-form-7"><strong>translate.wordpress.org</strong></a>.</p>";s:12:"installation";s:375:"<ol>
<li>Upload the entire <code>contact-form-7</code> folder to the <code>/wp-content/plugins/</code> directory.</li>
<li>Activate the plugin through the 'Plugins' menu in WordPress.</li>
</ol>

<p>You will find 'Contact' menu in your WordPress admin panel.</p>

<p>For basic usage, you can also have a look at the <a href="http://contactform7.com/">plugin homepage</a>.</p>";s:11:"screenshots";s:306:"<ol>
	<li>
		<a href='//ps.w.org/contact-form-7/assets/screenshot-1.png?rev=1179533' title='Click to view full-size screenshot 1'>			<img class='screenshot' src='//ps.w.org/contact-form-7/assets/screenshot-1.png?rev=1179533' alt='contact-form-7 screenshot 1' />
		</a>		<p>screenshot-1.png</p>
	</li>
</ol>";s:9:"changelog";s:2020:"<p>For more information, see <a href="http://contactform7.com/category/releases/">Releases</a>.</p>

<h4>4.6</h4>

<ul>
<li>Ajax loader: HTML markup changed to <code>&#60;span&#62;</code> to be easily customizable with CSS.</li>
<li>Appends a proper header and footer to HTML mail content automatically.</li>
<li><code>[_serial_number]</code> special mail-tag.</li>
<li>New form-tag type for hidden fields.</li>
<li><code>default:shortcode_attr</code> form-tag option.</li>
<li><code>WPCF7_Shortcode</code>, <code>WPCF7_ShortcodeManager</code>, <code>wpcf7_add_shortcode()</code>, <code>wpcf7_scan_shortcode()</code>, and some other classes and functions have become deprecated.</li>
<li>Removed all language files from the <em>languages</em> folder. Translations have moved to <a href="https://translate.wordpress.org/projects/wp-plugins/contact-form-7">translate.wordpress.org</a>.</li>
</ul>

<h4>4.5.1</h4>

<ul>
<li>Avoids JavaScript strict-mode errors seen with ill-designed themes.</li>
<li>Fixed a bug around reCAPTCHA's callback and expired-callback options.</li>
<li>Specifies cursor style for file uploading fields.</li>
<li>Corrects language tags for locale codes with modifying suffix like '_formal'.</li>
<li>Corrects wpcf7_is_rtl() output. Added 5 locales to the RTL locales list.</li>
<li>Language Packs: Language files for Portuguese (Brazil) (pt_BR) and Hebrew (he_IL) have been removed.</li>
</ul>

<h4>4.5</h4>

<ul>
<li>The default contact form template is revised.</li>
<li>reCAPTCHA: Run grecaptcha.reset() after a submission.</li>
<li>The autocomplete option for form-tags and wpcf7_form_autocomplete filter hook are introduced to manage autocomplete attribute.</li>
<li>The config validator is revised. The wpcf7_config_validator_validate action hook is introduced to allow 3rd-party to cut in.</li>
<li>A bug in character count form-tag is fixed.</li>
<li>Language Packs: Language files for Danish (da_DK), Polish (pl_PL), and Czech (cs_CZ) have been removed from the plugin package.</li>
</ul>";s:3:"faq";s:378:"<p>Do you have questions or issues with Contact Form 7? Use these support channels appropriately.</p>

<ol>
<li><a href="http://contactform7.com/docs/">Docs</a></li>
<li><a href="http://contactform7.com/faq/">FAQ</a></li>
<li><a href="http://wordpress.org/support/plugin/contact-form-7">Support Forum</a></li>
</ol>

<p><a href="http://contactform7.com/support/">Support</a></p>";}s:17:"short_description";s:54:"Just another contact form plugin. Simple but flexible.";s:13:"download_link";s:61:"https://downloads.wordpress.org/plugin/contact-form-7.4.6.zip";s:4:"tags";a:9:{s:4:"ajax";s:4:"AJAX";s:7:"akismet";s:7:"Akismet";s:7:"captcha";s:7:"captcha";s:7:"contact";s:7:"contact";s:12:"contact-form";s:12:"contact form";s:5:"email";s:5:"email";s:8:"feedback";s:8:"feedback";s:4:"form";s:4:"form";s:12:"multilingual";s:12:"multilingual";}s:11:"donate_link";s:31:"http://contactform7.com/donate/";s:5:"icons";a:2:{s:2:"2x";s:61:"//ps.w.org/contact-form-7/assets/icon-256x256.png?rev=1179533";s:2:"1x";s:61:"//ps.w.org/contact-form-7/assets/icon-128x128.png?rev=1179533";}}s:18:"wysija-newsletters";O:8:"stdClass":22:{s:4:"name";s:20:"MailPoet Newsletters";s:4:"slug";s:18:"wysija-newsletters";s:7:"version";s:5:"2.7.5";s:6:"author";s:47:"<a href="http://www.mailpoet.com/">MailPoet</a>";s:14:"author_profile";s:37:"https://profiles.wordpress.org/wysija";s:12:"contributors";a:1:{s:6:"wysija";s:37:"https://profiles.wordpress.org/wysija";}s:8:"requires";s:3:"3.5";s:6:"tested";s:5:"4.7.1";s:13:"compatibility";a:0:{}s:6:"rating";d:96;s:11:"num_ratings";s:4:"2483";s:7:"ratings";a:5:{i:5;s:4:"2257";i:4;s:3:"131";i:3;s:2:"19";i:2;s:2:"14";i:1;s:2:"62";}s:10:"downloaded";i:5300804;s:12:"last_updated";s:22:"2016-12-11 12:58am GMT";s:5:"added";s:10:"2011-12-03";s:8:"homepage";s:24:"http://www.mailpoet.com/";s:8:"sections";a:5:{s:11:"description";s:3178:"<p>Create newsletters, automated emails, post notifications and autoresponders. Capture subscribers with our signup widget. Drop your posts, images, social icons in your newsletter. Change fonts and colors on the fly. A simple newsletter solution for WordPress. Finally!</p>

<p>We built it with the idea that newsletters in WordPress should be easy. Not hard. Forget MailChimp, Aweber, etc. We're the good guys inside your WordPress.</p>

<p><a href="http://demo.mailpoet.com/launch/">Try the demo.</a></p>

<h4>Check out this 2 minute video.</h4>


<div class='video'></div>


<h4>Features</h4>

<ul>
<li>Drag &#38; drop newsletter editor</li>
<li>Send your latest posts automatically</li>
<li>Autoresponders, i.e. "Send email 3 days after someone subscribes"</li>
<li>Send emails to your WordPress users</li>
<li>Start collecting subscribers in 2-clicks with our sign up widget</li>
<li>Single or double opt-in, your choice</li>
<li>Import subscribers in 2 steps</li>
<li>Get stats for your newsletter: opens, clicks, unsubscribes</li>
<li>Drag and drop subscription form designer</li>
<li>Your newsletters look the same in Gmail, iPhone, Android, Outlook, Yahoo, Hotmail, etc.</li>
<li>Send with your web host, Gmail, any SMTP, like SendGrid, Amazon SES Mandrill, etc...</li>
<li>Segment your lists based on unopened, opened and clicked</li>
<li><a href="http://www.mailpoet.com/newsletter-templates-wordpress/">Selection of over 70 themes</a>. Photoshop files included</li>
<li>Sending newsletters in the free version is limited to 2000 subscribers</li>
</ul>

<h4>Premium version</h4>

<p><a href="http://www.mailpoet.com/premium/">MailPoet Premium</a> offers these nifty extra features:</p>

<ul>
<li>Send to more than 2000 subscribers</li>
<li>A beautiful statistics dashboard to compare your newsletters, and subscribers</li>
<li>Detailed stats for each subscriber and newsletter</li>
<li>Automated bounce handling, keep your subscribers' list clean</li>
<li>Test your spam score before you send a newsletter to your subscribers</li>
<li>Improve deliverability with DKIM signature</li>
<li>Don't reinstall. Simply install an additional plugin</li>
<li>Priority support: let us optimize your settings!</li>
</ul>

<p><a href="http://www.mailpoet.com/premium/">Visit our Premium page</a>.</p>

<h4>Support</h4>

<p>Find over 80 articles in our documentation:</p>

<p><a href="http://support.mailpoet.com/">support.mailpoet.com</a></p>

<h4>Translations in your language</h4>

<p><a href="http://support.mailpoet.com/knowledgebase/translations-in-your-language/">Get a Premium plugin license in exchange for your help in translation</a></p>

<ul>
<li>Arabic</li>
<li>Basque</li>
<li>Catalan</li>
<li>Chinese</li>
<li>Croatian</li>
<li>Czech</li>
<li>Danish</li>
<li>Dutch</li>
<li>French (but of course!)</li>
<li>German</li>
<li>Greek</li>
<li>Hebrew</li>
<li>Hungarian</li>
<li>Indonesian</li>
<li>Italian</li>
<li>Japanese</li>
<li>Norwegian</li>
<li>Persian</li>
<li>Polish</li>
<li>Portuguese PT</li>
<li>Portuguese BR</li>
<li>Romanian</li>
<li>Russian</li>
<li>Serbian</li>
<li>Slovak</li>
<li>Slovenian</li>
<li>Spanish</li>
<li>Swedish</li>
<li>Turkish</li>
</ul>";s:12:"installation";s:953:"<p>There are 3 ways to install this plugin:</p>

<h4>1. The super easy way</h4>

<ol>
<li>In your Admin, go to menu Plugins &#62; Add</li>
<li>Search for <code>mailpoet</code></li>
<li>Click to install</li>
<li>Activate the plugin</li>
<li>A new menu <code>mailpoet</code> will appear in your Admin</li>
</ol>

<h4>2. The easy way</h4>

<ol>
<li>Download the plugin (.zip file) on the right column of this page</li>
<li>In your Admin, go to menu Plugins &#62; Add</li>
<li>Select the tab "Upload"</li>
<li>Upload the .zip file you just downloaded</li>
<li>Activate the plugin</li>
<li>A new menu <code>MailPoet</code> will appear in your Admin</li>
</ol>

<h4>3. The old and reliable way (FTP)</h4>

<ol>
<li>Upload <code>wysija-newsletters</code> folder to the <code>/wp-content/plugins/</code> directory</li>
<li>Activate the plugin through the 'Plugins' menu in WordPress</li>
<li>A new menu <code>MailPoet</code> will appear in your Admin</li>
</ol>";s:11:"screenshots";s:2258:"<ol>

</ol>";s:9:"changelog";s:54603:"<h4>2.7.5 - 2016-08-18</h4>

<ul>
<li>Fixed subscription form widget</li>
</ul>

<h4>2.7.4 - 2016-08-09</h4>

<ul>
<li>Fixed error appearing during newsletter creation</li>
</ul>

<h4>2.7.3 - 2016-08-08</h4>

<ul>
<li>Fixed issue with emoji when saving newsletters</li>
<li>Prevent encoding of "tel:" URLs</li>
<li>Fixed SQL injection vulnerability (Thanks to Force Interactive)</li>
<li>Fixed XSS vulnerability (Thanks to Sipke Mellema from Securify B.V.)</li>
<li>Fixed PHP warnings on Bounce management</li>
<li>Escape commma and quote marks during export</li>
<li>Fixed some editor issues</li>
<li>Fixed double signed DKIM emails</li>
</ul>

<h4>2.7.2 - 2016-06-01</h4>

<ul>
<li>Fixed broken CSS for Premium page</li>
<li>Fixed Custom Fields not saving on front-end</li>
<li>Fixed image ratio for specific locations</li>
<li>Fixed issue with missing rule (onlyNumberSp) in Italian &#38; German translations</li>
<li>Fixed broken email validation in Dutch language with long extensions</li>
<li>Fixed undefined property notice on Bounce pages</li>
<li>Added SparkPost API support</li>
<li>Fixed security issues. Thanks again to Falk Huber (T-Systems) for reporting them</li>
<li>Added new menu icon (New MailPoet Branding)</li>
<li>Fixed sending preview of an email with an empty subject</li>
<li>Added Ukrainian JS validation language</li>
<li>Replaced deprecated get_currentuserinfo() with wp_get_current_user()</li>
<li>Fixed PHP notices that may have appeared during the sending process</li>
</ul>

<h4>2.7.1 - 2016-03-15</h4>

<ul>
<li>Fixed security issues. Thanks to Falk Huber for letting us now.</li>
</ul>

<h4>2.7 - 2016-01-29</h4>

<ul>
<li>Enabled PHP7 compatibility</li>
<li>Fixed security issues. Thanks to Immunity and Netsparker (<a href="https://www.netsparker.com" rel="nofollow">https://www.netsparker.com</a>) for alerting us.</li>
<li>Fixed an issue with newsletters not saving during the creation process</li>
<li>Disabled SSL verification on hosts with invalid SSL certificates and PHP 5.6</li>
<li>Updated SendGrid mailer</li>
<li>Improved URL validation logic</li>
<li>Addressed PHP notices that appeared in cron output</li>
<li>Fixed other minor issues</li>
</ul>

<h4>2.6.19 - 2015-10-13</h4>

<ul>
<li>Fixed a URL validation issue when WP's home &#38; site URLs are different. Kudos to Divaldo for pointing it out.</li>
</ul>

<h4>2.6.18 - 2015-09-21</h4>

<ul>
<li>Fixed URL validation issue</li>
<li>Improved newsletter/subscriber search</li>
<li>Fixed minor issues</li>
</ul>

<h4>2.6.17 - 2015-09-04</h4>

<ul>
<li>Enhanced redirection check in email URLs.</li>
<li>Fixed old-style PHP constructors.</li>
<li>Fixed newsletter preview bug.</li>
<li>Fixed import issues on old PHP versions.</li>
<li>Fixed minor issues.</li>
</ul>

<h4>2.6.16 - 2015-06-23</h4>

<ul>
<li>Added HHVM support</li>
<li>Added MariaDB support</li>
<li>Fixed import issue where existing subscriber's data was not updated</li>
<li>Fixed minor issues</li>
</ul>

<h4>2.6.15 - 2015-02-17</h4>

<ul>
<li>Fixed hidden signup confirmation when the theme "Twenty Fifteen" is activated</li>
<li>Fixed import issue on Windows servers, all valid subscribers CSV files can be imported now</li>
<li>Fixed the filter "Subscribers in no list" in the Subscribers' listing in the backend</li>
<li>Fixed bug in the frontend subscriptions page with the shortcode [wysija_page] not being replaced</li>
<li>Fixed rendering issue when sending WordPress Post notifications including multiple levels of nested HTML lists(ul &#38; ol)</li>
<li>Improved performance in the Subscribers' listing</li>
<li>Improved scheduled tasks process responses for greater reliability</li>
<li>Added "WBounce" to our list of compatible plugins in Settings &#62; Add-ons</li>
<li>Added non-translated strings for the subscribe and unsubscribe admin notifications</li>
</ul>

<h4>2.6.14 - 2014-11-26</h4>

<ul>
<li>Fixed all of the RTL issues on delivered newsletters and their web version</li>
<li>Fixed issue when importing subscribers with new custom fields</li>
<li>Fixed duplicated Monthly post notifications issue</li>
<li>Fixed View in Browser version deactivation</li>
<li>Removed option to switch to Beta</li>
</ul>

<h4>2.6.13 - 2014-10-27</h4>

<ul>
<li>Fixed a conflict with the plugin <a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/magic-action-box/">Magic Action Box</a></li>
<li>Fixed blank export file when exporting subscribers with custom fields</li>
<li>Fixed the default subscribers ordering in the backend, we now display the most recent first</li>
<li>Fixed the bug on Bold and Italic commands in our newsletter editor</li>
<li>Fixed an issue on the new bulk resend confirmation email feature</li>
<li>Fixed bounce management issue (Premium only), counting until 3 when a mailbox is full</li>
</ul>

<h4>2.6.12 - 2014-10-16</h4>

<ul>
<li>Improved security thanks to Dominik Schilling, <a href="http://planetzuda.com">Ryan Satterfield</a> and <a href="https://logicaltrust.net/en/">Logical Trust</a></li>
<li>Improved performance issue</li>
<li>Improved email rendering</li>
<li>Improved our stats dashboard, now they have a few more goodiness attached to them</li>
<li>Improved Subscribers' Export, better data encoding for Windows servers</li>
<li>Improved Form Editor, Date fields now accept dates prior to 1970</li>
<li>Fixed conflict with EditFlow in our Visual Editor</li>
<li>Fixed rare bug on Windows Server stopping you from sending emails</li>
<li>Added option to Resend confirmation email in the Subscriber's listing</li>
<li>Hard at work cleaning up our code and making it better</li>
</ul>

<h4>2.6.11 - 2014-08-14</h4>

<ul>
<li>Improved protection against CSRF attacks thanks to Yoshinori Matsumoto.</li>
<li>Fixed bug on scheduled newsletters edited back and forth and becoming uneditable.</li>
<li>Fixed when duplicating an email through the stats page of a newsletter, then deleting the duplicate would also delete the original.</li>
<li>Old code Spring cleaning part 2, getting rid of the junk.</li>
</ul>

<h4>2.6.10 - 2014-08-04</h4>

<ul>
<li>Improved protection of themes upload, unsubscribe links, file access and statistics.</li>
<li>Improved the "Send a test email" function.</li>
<li>Fixed never ending process while sending previews on certain servers.</li>
<li>Fixed a few regular expressions for a better rendering in Outlook.</li>
<li>Fixed memory issue when dropping the "WordPress Post" widget on sites with thousands of taxonomies.</li>
<li>Fixed wrong subscribers count in the subscribers' listing.</li>
<li>Old code Spring cleaning, removed unused rusty pieces.</li>
</ul>

<h4>2.6.9 - 2014-07-14</h4>

<ul>
<li>Fixed email display issues caused by responsive CSS. We're truly sorry for this.</li>
<li>New columns on Subscribers page: "Never opened or clicked"</li>
<li>Removed "Unconfirmed" filter on Subscribers page when signup confirmation is off</li>
<li>Fixed a few minor bugs on the Statistics page for Premium users. Thanks for your feedbacks!</li>
<li>Fixed our hair with spray to look like cool kids in the eighties</li>
</ul>

<h4>2.6.8 - 2014-07-04</h4>

<ul>
<li>Fixed security issue reported by our dear Dominic. Thank you sir!</li>
</ul>

<h4>2.6.7 - 2014-07-01</h4>

<ul>
<li>Added 1 more add-on to our plugin's listing</li>
<li>Implemented a new Email Rendering Engine, with a lot of bugs fixed for Outlook users and Mobile Users</li>
<li>Fixed broken "Automatic Latest Content" settings on sites with lots of tags</li>
<li>Fixed fatal error when sending to more than 1 million total subscribers</li>
<li>Fixed subscribers page being inaccessible on some Multisites (very rare bug)</li>
<li>Fixed Outlook 2013 paragraph spacing issue on previous beta</li>
<li>Fixed security issue reported by <a href="http://sucuri.net/">Sucuri</a></li>
<li>Fixed the HTML button on TinyMCE which was hidden in editor</li>
<li>Fixed the links popup on TinyMCE for IE11 in editor</li>
<li>Fixed "automated latest content" (ALC) bugs with multiple Custom Post Types</li>
<li>Fixed the upload image functionality in our plugin</li>
<li>Fixed default item selected on filter lists at the Subscribers page for Firefox and Opera users</li>
<li>Fixed warning message appearing on the subscription form for Admin Users</li>
<li>Fixed a few typos in the plugin</li>
<li>Improved the CSV export to expand its compatibility with Excel on Windows</li>
<li>Improved the performance of the plugin when loading admin assets</li>
</ul>

<h4>2.6.6 - 2014-04-30</h4>

<ul>
<li>Fixed the Upload Image functionality in our plugin</li>
<li>Fixed default item selected on filter lists at the Users Page for Firefox and Opera users</li>
<li>Fixed warning message appearing on the Subscription form for Admin Users</li>
<li>Fixed some typos in the plugin</li>
<li>Improved the performance of the plugin when Loading admin assets</li>
</ul>

<h4>2.6.5 - 2014-04-18</h4>

<ul>
<li>Fixed TinyMCE issue with WordPress 3.9, our editor in Step 2 is working again</li>
<li>Fixed conflicting shortcode between MailPoet's custom fields and Ultimate TinyMCE shortcode</li>
</ul>

<h4>2.6.4 - 2014-04-17</h4>

<ul>
<li>Fixed compatibility issue with WordPress 3.9: the TinyMCE editor in WordPress Posts edition page was broken</li>
<li>Fixed regular expression on Google analytics tracking code (Premium only)</li>
<li>Fixed the importing method, compatible to more CSV formats</li>
<li>Hey, we still have an issue with WordPress 3.9, our tinyMCE editor in Step 2 of the newsletter edition is not working properly (buttons are not usable)</li>
<li>No need to report us that issue, we're already working hard to fix it. Thanks for your patience! :)</li>
</ul>

<h4>2.6.3 - 2014-04-16</h4>

<ul>
<li>Fixed filters on Automated Latest Content for Taxonomies and Post Types</li>
<li>Fixed White Screen on What's New page after updating</li>
<li>Fixed display bug, image sitting on top of the text editor in the Step2 of newsletter edition</li>
<li>Added support for <code>mysqli</code> of WordPress 3.9</li>
<li>Replaced The tooltip script "qTip2" in favor of "Bootstrap's Tooltip" (JavaScript Library)</li>
</ul>

<h4>2.6.2 - 2014-04-01</h4>

<ul>
<li>Fixed Javascript conflict breaking some of WordPress post editor function (add media upload, etc ...)</li>
<li>Fixed bugs when using bulk actions within WordPress plugins listing</li>
<li>Fixed a rendering issue on the welcome page</li>
<li>Fixed ability to make firstname and last name field required fields on the subscription forms</li>
<li>Fixed rare issue of WordPress media uploader sending HTTP 500 error when uploading an image</li>
<li>Improved the performance of the plugin with a better version handling</li>
<li>Improved the Import/Export tools</li>
<li>Improved "admin_body_class" to be more consistent</li>
<li>Improved consistency for settings defaults</li>
<li>Improved the inner tabs JavaScript on the settings page in premium version</li>
<li>Improved the JavaScript on the "WordPress post" widget</li>
<li>Remove badly named functions creating conflicts on step 3 of the newsletter creation process</li>
</ul>

<h4>2.6.1 - 2014-03-25</h4>

<ul>
<li>Fixed a conflict with the "Ultimate Shortcode" plugin breaking our subscription forms</li>
<li>Fixed automatically inserted text in confirmation/subscription pages</li>
<li>Improved CSV special characters handling in the Subscribers import functionality</li>
<li>Improved some of our warnings in the backend to make the messages clearer</li>
<li>Improved MailPoet Statistics Page with styling compatible to WordPress v3.8</li>
<li>Improved handling Big Databases on daily post notifications</li>
<li>Added extra information in the Newsletters' statistics page for an efficient summary</li>
<li>Added German Disclaimer to a new Docs Folder for legal purpose</li>
<li>Minor changes improving the User Experience in some of our Forms in the backend</li>
<li>Replaced The autoselection script "Choosen" in favor of "Select2" (JavaScript Library)</li>
</ul>

<h4>2.6 - 2014-03-18</h4>

<ul>
<li>This is the juiciest of all releases. Ready?</li>
<li>a new statistics dashboard in Premium. The beauty of the big picture</li>
<li>add more fields in your subscription forms, like phone number, address, or whatever you like</li>
<li>display an archive of your past newsletters in a page with a shortcode. Find it in the settings</li>
<li>display your posts' author names and categories in the newsletter editor</li>
<li>insert several posts at once in the editor, instead of one at a time. Time saver</li>
<li>a dozen new display options when you drop your posts in the newsletter, for the control freaks</li>
<li>find a list of add-ons in the settings. Plug your MailPoet with your other favorite plugins, like Gravity Forms</li>
<li>select your own WordPress pages for your confirmation and unsubscribe pages</li>
<li>use your MailPoet shortcodes in your confirmation emails, like [user:firstname &#124; default:reader]</li>
<li>MailPoet now abides to German privacy laws. Guten tag Alex!</li>
<li>the browser version of your newsletter now include the Google Analytics tracking code (Premium)</li>
<li>right to left language improvements</li>
<li>our user interface is now styled for 3.8</li>
<li>needless to say, hundreds of mini improvements</li>
<li>we hand over to you 6 months of hard work. Enjoy!</li>
</ul>

<h4>2.6.beta - 2013-12-19 to 2014-03-18</h4>

<ul>
<li>The latest Beta for v2.6</li>
<li>Fixed stable update URL to the Core Repository</li>
<li>Google Analytics URLs now working as expected</li>
<li>Update warning fixed</li>
<li>fixed links url not being properly saved in some case when using the google campaign code</li>
<li>fixed queue processing fatal error, halting the sending process (only in rare case scenarios)</li>
<li>Automatic latest content widget improved</li>
<li>added minor visual improvements to fit better WP 3.8 style</li>
<li>Mail-tester now works also on ssl sites</li>
<li>Theme installation now works with https protected sites too</li>
<li>Adapted buttons to the WordPress 3.8 style</li>
<li>Changed some image icons to use <code>dashicons</code></li>
<li>Removed notices regarding an unused file</li>
<li>Removed a bug on FROM email input tooltip</li>
<li>Removed MySQL bugs on Stats dashboard filters</li>
<li>Enhanced the Widget AJAX URL method</li>
<li>Fixed some CSS positioning issue around buttons</li>
<li>Adapted the notices/warnings style to WordPress 3.8</li>
<li>Improvements on Bulk actions for Subscribers and Newsletters</li>
<li>Fixed domain column missing</li>
<li>Fixed problems with problem author name for automatic newsletters</li>
<li>Removed notices on preview on Browser</li>
<li>improved the update plugin process</li>
<li>better CSS for the add-ons bage</li>
<li>fixed bug on bulk actions for subscribers and newsletters</li>
<li>removing some PHP Notices/Warnings</li>
<li>improved installing premium plugin process</li>
<li>added newsletter bulk delete option</li>
<li>fixed a bug throwing an error trying to update "Warning: fopen(..."</li>
<li>improved RTL on form editor</li>
<li>added smoother auto update process free and premium plugin happening together</li>
<li>small corrections on statistics dashboard form editor and newsletter editor</li>
<li>added better support for Retina displays</li>
<li>added custom fields functionality in the form editor section</li>
<li>improved stats dashboard for premium users</li>
<li>added archive page shortcode</li>
<li>added select your own confirmation page</li>
</ul>

<h4>2.5.9.4 - 2013-12-26</h4>

<ul>
<li>fixed rare bug emails being re-enqueued when a partially sent newsletter was paused and edited from step3</li>
<li>fixed improved bounce emails detection to handle more case scenarios (premium only)</li>
<li>added better support for Retina displays</li>
<li>added facelift and botoxed lips much needed for our best WP 3.8 looks</li>
</ul>

<h4>2.5.9.3 - 2013-12-03</h4>

<ul>
<li>fixed another rare case where image goes missing when dragging and dropping a WordPress' post into our visual editor</li>
<li>fixed post updates taking too long when refreshing automatic newsletters with the "automated latest content" widget</li>
<li>fixed rare case where image goes missing when dragging and dropping an uploaded image into our visual editor</li>
<li>fixed birthday cake for our two years anniversary  <a href="http://www.mailpoet.com/two-year-anniversary/" rel="nofollow">http://www.mailpoet.com/two-year-anniversary/</a></li>
</ul>

<h4>2.5.9.2 - 2013-11-26</h4>

<ul>
<li>fixed issue automatic newsletter not going out when using Wysija's cron triggered by visitors pageview in Settings &#62; Advanced</li>
<li>fixed issue wrong separator in export file(CSV or Excel)</li>
</ul>

<h4>2.5.9.1 - 2013-11-18</h4>

<ul>
<li>fixed newsletters not being saved in Chrome at visual editor level</li>
<li>fixed daily/weekly post notifications missing some articles if other newsletters were being sent at the same time</li>
<li>fixed broken redirection when square brackets are present in your URLs</li>
<li>fixed rare case where image goes missing when dragging and dropping a WordPress' post into our visual editor</li>
<li>fixed "View in your Browser" and "Unsubscribe" not being translated in your language in daily/weekly post notifications</li>
<li>fixed broken links with port specified (e.g.: mysiteurl.com:8888/my-post)</li>
<li>fixed updating automatically the "automated latest content" widget in automatic newsletter on create/update/delete any post</li>
</ul>

<h4>2.5.9 - 2013-10-02</h4>

<ul>
<li>improved multisite bounce process</li>
<li>improved email validation</li>
<li>improved IP recording</li>
<li>fixed issue with "Magic Members" plugin adding their list of users when one of our forms shortcode was in a post/page</li>
<li>fixed notice in the links tracking controller in the frontend</li>
<li>fixed cross image in popup was slightly shifted</li>
<li>fixed network sending method not inheriting the right parameters in MS (From address, etc...)</li>
<li>fixed issue when trying to delete first list in list selection widget</li>
</ul>

<h4>2.5.8 - 2013-09-05</h4>

<ul>

<li>fixed premium mail-tester iframe not working on modern browser</li>
<li>fixed send_at parameter being updated wrongfully for automatic newsletters</li>
</ul>

<h4>2.5.7 - 2013-09-04</h4>

<ul>
<li>fixed missing cron schedules for post notifications and scheduled newsletters</li>
<li>fixed issue with auto save when switching themes</li>
<li>fixed issue preventing the deletion of newly added image</li>
<li>fixed sending method not being override in multisite</li>
<li>fixed validation messages not translated on some MS sites due to language locale issue</li>
<li>improved better use of the language definition so that we understand on which language a WPML site is for instance</li>
<li>improved better use of the language definition (removed WPLANG) so that we understand on which language a WPML site is for instance</li>
<li>added retina icons for text editor</li>
</ul>

<h4>2.5.5 - 2013-08-05</h4>

<ul>
<li>fixed compatibility issue with WordPress 3.6 and latest jQuery</li>

<li>fixed wild "Security failure during request." in the backend of some server configurations</li>
<li>fixed count issues on subscribers and list</li>
<li>fixed failing to send post notification newsletter preview with the tag [newsletter:post_title]</li>
<li>refactored export and import code</li>
<li>improved MailPoet's cron in order to respect better the delays between one scheduled task and another</li>
</ul>

</ul>

<li>added single sending method for all sites in Multisite. See new "MS" tab in settings for more</li>
<li>added DKIM optional upgrade to 1024 bits to comply with Gmail (Premium feature)</li>
<li>added support for Premium behind firewall with no possible requests to MailPoet.com</li>
<li>fixed images uploaded in MailPoet are now resized to 600px. Next release will include images from media library.</li>
<li>fixed lightbox (popups) width for right to left languages</li>
<li>fixed subscription form on WordPress user registration</li>

</ul>

<h4>2.1 - 2012-08-31</h4>

<ul>
<li>added ability for subscribers to change their email and lists.</li>
<li>added "View it in your browser" option.</li>
<li>added advanced access rights with capabilities for subscribers management, newsletter management, settings and subscription widget.</li>
<li>added new WordPress 3.3 plupload used when possible to use.</li>
<li>added mail-tester.com integration for Premium (fight against spam).</li>
<li>added DKIM signature for Premium to improve deliverability.</li>
<li>added the possibility to preview your newsletter without images in visual editor.</li>
<li>added background colors for blocks within the visual editor.</li>
<li>added alternate background colors for automatic latest post widget.</li>
<li>added possibility to add total number of subscribers in widget with shortcode.</li>
<li>added widget option "Display label within for Email field".</li>
<li>improved email rendering and email clients compatibility including the new Outlook 2013</li>
<li>improved image upload with ssl.</li>
<li>improved compatibility with access rights plugins like "Advanced Access Manager" or "User Role Editor".</li>
<li>improved import system with clearer message.</li>
<li>improved subscription widget, added security if there is no list selected.</li>
<li>improved Auto newsletter edition, warning added before pausing it.</li>
<li>improved popups for the visual editor (themes, images, add link,...)</li>
<li>updated TinyMCE to latest version, the editor now reflects the newsletter styles</li>
<li>compatibility with <a href="http://wordpress.org/extend/plugins/magic-action-box/">Magic Action Box</a>.</li>
<li>fixed links style in headings.</li>
<li>fixed no default value in optin form when JS disabled.</li>
<li>fixed issue with automatic latest post widget where one article could appear more than once.</li>
</ul>

<h4>2.0.9.5 - 2012-08-15</h4>

<ul>
<li>fixed post notification hook when post's status change from publish to draft and back to publish.</li>
<li>fixed firewall 2 avoid troubles with image uploader automatically</li>
<li>fixed problem of confirmation page on some servers when pretty links activated on wysijap post. Default is params link now.</li>
</ul>

<h4>2.0.9 - 2012-08-03</h4>

<ul>
<li>improved debug mode with different level for different needs</li>
<li>added logging function to monitor post notification process for instance</li>
<li>improved send immediately post notification (in some case the trigger was not working... using different WordPress hook now)</li>
<li>fixed post notification interface (step1 and step3) not compatible with WordPress lower than 3.3</li>
<li>fixed issue when duplicating sent post notifications. You should not be able to copy a child email and then change it's type like an automatic newsletter etc...</li>
<li>fixed zip format error when uploading your own theme (this error was happenning on various browsers)</li>
</ul>

<h4>2.0.8 - 2012-07-27</h4>

<li>fixed php error on subscription form creation</li>
<li>fixed php error on helper back</li>
</ul>

<h4>2.0.7 - 2012-07-21</h4>
