<li>added non translated 'Loading...' string on subscription's frontend</li>
</ul>

<h4>2.0.6 - 2012-07-20</h4>

<ul>
<li>fixed unreliable WP_PLUGIN_URL when dealing with https constants now using plugins_url() instead</li>
<li>fixed automatic newsletter resending itself on unsubscribe</li>
<li>fixed when unsubscribing and registering to some lists, you will not be re-registered to your previous lists</li>
<li>fixed issue with small height images not displaying in email</li>
<li>fixed issue with post excerpt in automatic posts</li>
<li>improved php 5.4 strictness compatibility</li>
</ul>

<h4>2.0.5 - 2012-07-13</h4>

<ul>
<li>added extended check of caching plugin activation</li>
<li>added security to disallow directory browsing</li>
<li>added subscription form working now with Quick-cache and Hyper cache(Already working with WP Super Cache &#38;&#38; W3 Total Cache)</li>
<li>added onload attribute on iframe subscription form which seems more reliable</li>
<li>added independant cron manager wysija_cron.php</li>
<li>added cleaning the queue of deleted users or deleted emails through phpmyadmin for instance</li>
<li>added theme menu erasing MailPoet's menu when in the position right below ours</li>
</ul>

<h4>2.0.4 - 2012-07-05</h4>

<ul>
<li>added for dummies check that list exists or subscription form widget not editable</li>
<li>fixed problem with plugin wordpress-https when doing ajax subscription</li>
<li>fixed issue with scheduled articles not being sent in post notification</li>
<li>fixed rare issue when inserting a WordPress post would trigger an error</li>
<li>fixed issue wrong count of ignored emails when importing</li>
<li>fixed multi forms several send confirmation emails on one subscribing request</li>
<li>fixed subject title in email template</li>
</ul>

<h4>2.0.3 - 2012-06-26</h4>

<ul>
<li>fixed theme activation not working</li>
<li>fixed google analytics code on iframe subscription forms</li>
<li>fixed post notification bug with wrong category selected when fetching articles</li>
<li>fixed issue regarding category selection in auto responder / post notifications</li>
<li>fixed dollar sign being stripped in post titles</li>
<li>fixed warning and notices when adding a list</li>
<li>fixed on some server unsubscribe page or confirmation page redirecting to 404</li>
<li>improved iframe system works now with short url and multiple forms</li>
</ul>

<h4>2.0.2 - 2012-06-21</h4>

<ul>
<li>fixed missing title on widget when cache plugin activated</li>
<li>fixed update procedure to MailPoet version "2.0" failed! on some MySQL servers</li>
<li>fixed W3C validation for subscription form with empty action: replace with #wysija</li>
<li>fixed forbidden iframe subfolder corrected to a home url with params</li>
<li>improved theme installation with PclZip</li>
<li>fixed missing previously sent auto newsletter on newsletters page</li>
<li>fixed broken url for images uploaded in WordPress 3.4</li>
<li>fixed "nl 2 br" on unsubscribed notification messages for admins</li>
<li>added meta noindex on iframe forms to avoid polluting Google Analytics</li>
<li>added validation of lists on subscription form</li>
<li>fixed issue with image alignment in automatic newsletters</li>
<li>fixed url &#38; alternative text encoding in header/footer</li>
<li>fixed images thumbs not displaying in Images tab</li>
<li>fixed popups' CSS due to WordPress 3.4 update</li>
<li>fixed issues when creating new lists from segment</li>
</ul>

<h4>2.0.1 - 2012-06-16</h4>

<ul>
<li>fixed subscribers not added to the lists on old type of widget</li>
</ul>

<h4>2.0 - 2012-06-15</h4>

<ul>
<li>Added post notifications</li>
<li>Added auto responders</li>
<li>Added scheduling (send in future)</li>
<li>allow subscribers to select lists</li>
<li>embed subscription form outside your WordPress site (find code in the widget)</li>
<li>Subscription forms compatibility with W3 Total Cache and WP Supercache</li>
<li>Load social bookmarks from theme automatically</li>
<li>Several bug fixes and micro improvements</li>
<li>Ability to send snail mail</li>
</ul>

<h4>1.1.5 - 2012-05-21</h4>

<ul>
<li>improved report after importing csv</li>
<li>fixed Warning: sprintf() /helpers/back.php on some environnements</li>
<li>fixed roles for creating newsletters or managing subscribers "parent roles can edit as well as child roles if a child role is selected"</li>
<li>fixed cron MailPoet's frequencies added in a cleaner way to avoid conflict with other plugins</li>
<li>fixed w3c validation on confirmation and unsubscription page</li>
<li>improved avoiding duplicates on environment with high sending frequencies</li>
<li>removed php show errors lost in resolveConflicts</li>
</ul>

<h4>1.1.4 - 2012-05-14</h4>

<ul>
<li>added last name to recipient name in header</li>
<li>fixed automatic redirection for https links in newsletter</li>
<li>fixed conflict with Advanced Custom Fields (ACF) plugin in the newsletter editor</li>
<li>fixed conflict with the WpToFacebook plugin</li>
<li>fixed validation on import of addresses with trim</li>
<li>fixed dysfunctional unsubscribe link when Google Analytics campaign inserted</li>
<li>added alphanumeric validation on Google Analytics input</li>
<li>display clicked links in stats without Google Analytics parameters</li>
<li>fixed page/post newsletter subscription widget when javascript conflict returns base64 string</li>
<li>fixed WP users synch when subscriber with same email already exists</li>
<li>fixed encoded url recorded in click stats</li>
<li>added sending status In Queue to differentiate with Not Sent</li>
<li>fixed automatic bounce handling</li>
<li>added custom roles and permissions</li>
</ul>

<h4>1.1.3 - 2012-03-31</h4>

<ul>
<li>fixed unsubscribe link redirection</li>
<li>fixed rare issue preventing Mac users from uploading images</li>
<li>added Norwegian translation</li>
<li>added Slovak translation</li>
</ul>

<h4>1.1.2 - 2012-03-26</h4>

<ul>
<li>fixed automatically recreates the subscription page when accidentally deleted</li>
<li>fixed more accurate message about folder permissions in wp-content/uploads</li>
<li>fixed possibility to delete synchronisable lists</li>
<li>fixed pagination on subscribers lists' listing</li>
<li>fixed google analytics tracking code</li>
<li>fixed relative path to image in newsletter now forced to absolute path</li>
<li>fixed widget alignment when labels not within field default value is now within field</li>
<li>fixed automatic bounce handling error on some server.</li>
<li>fixed scripts enqueuing in frontend, will print as long as there is a wp_footer function call in your theme</li>
<li>fixed theme manager returns error on install</li>
<li>fixed conflict with the SmallBiz theme</li>
<li>fixed conflict with the Events plugin (wp-events)</li>
<li>fixed conflict with the Email Users plugin (email-users)</li>
<li>fixed outlook 2007 rendering issue</li>
</ul>

<h4>1.1.1 - 2012-03-13</h4>

<ul>
<li>fixed small IE8 and IE9 compatibility issues</li>
<li>fixed fatal error for new installation</li>
<li>fixed MailPoet admin white screen on wordpress due to get_current_screen function</li>
<li>fixed unsubscribe link disappearing because of qtranslate fix</li>
<li>fixed old separators just blocked the email wizard</li>
<li>fixed unsubscribe link disappearing because of default color</li>
<li>fixed settings panel redirection</li>
<li>fixed update error message corrected :"An error occurred during the update" sounding like update failed even though it succeeded</li>
<li>fixed rendering of aligned text</li>
<li>fixed daily report email information</li>
<li>fixed export: first line with comma, the rest with semi colon now is all semi colon</li>
<li>fixed filter by list on subscribers when going on next pages with pagination</li>
<li>fixed get_avatar during install completely irrelevant</li>
<li>fixed wordpress post in editor when an article had an image with height 0px</li>
<li>fixed when domain does not exist, trying to send email, we need to flag it as undelivered after 3 tries and remove it from the queue</li>
<li>fixed user tags [user:firstname &#124; default:subscriber] left over when sent through queue and on some users</li>
<li>fixed get_version when wp-admin folder doesn't exist...</li>
<li>fixed Bulk Unsubscribe from all list "why can't I add him"</li>
</ul>

<h4>1.1 - 2012/03/03</h4>

<ul>
<li>support for first and last names</li>
<li>14 new themes. First Premium themes</li>
<li>added social bookmarks widget</li>
<li>added new divider widget</li>
<li>added first name and last name feature in subscription form, newsletter content and email subject</li>
<li>header is now image only and not text/image</li>
<li>small changes in Styles tab of visual editor</li>
<li>new full width footer image area (600px)</li>
<li>added transparency feature to header, footer, newsletter</li>
<li>newsletter width for content narrowed to 564px</li>
<li>improved line-height for titles in text editor</li>
<li>fixed Outlook and Hotmail padding issue with images</li>
<li>improved speed of editor</li>
<li>possibility to import automatically and keep in sync lists from all major plugins: MailPress, Satollo, WP-Autoresponder, Tribulant, Subscribe2, etc.</li>
<li>possibility to change "Unsubscribe" link text in footer</li>
<li>choose which role can edit subscribers</li>
<li>preview of newsletter in new window and not in popup</li>
<li>added possibility to choose between excerpt or full article on inserting WP post</li>
<li>theme management with API. Themes are now externalized from plugin.</li>
<li>removed numbered lists from text editor because of inconsistent display, notably Outlook</li>
</ul>

<h4>1.0.1 - 2012/01/18</h4>

<ul>
<li>added SMTP TLS support, useful for instance with live.com smtp</li>
<li>added support for special Danish chars in email subscriptions</li>
<li>fixed menu position conflict with other themes and plugins</li>
<li>fixed subscription form works with jquery 1.3, compatible for themes that use it</li>
<li>fixed issue of drag &#38; drop of WP post not working with php magic quotes</li>
<li>fixed permissions issue. Only admins could use the plugin despite changing the permissions in Settings &#62; Advanced.</li>
<li>fixed display of successful subscription in widget displays better in most theme</li>
<li>fixed synching of WordPress user registering through frontend /wp-login.php?action=register</li>
<li>fixed redirection unsubscribe link from preview emails</li>
<li>fixed cross site scripting security threat</li>
<li>fixed pagination on newsletter statistics's page</li>
<li>fixed javascript conflict with Tribulant's javascript's includes</li>
<li>improved detection of errors during installation</li>
</ul>

<h4>1.0 - 2011/12/23</h4>

<ul>
<li>Premium upgrade available</li>
<li>fix image selector width in editor</li>
<li>fix front stats of email when email preview and show errors all</li>
<li>fix front stats of email when show errors all</li>
<li>fix import ONLY subscribed from external plugins such as Tribulant or Satollo</li>
<li>fix retrieve wp.posts when time is different on mysql server and apache server</li>
<li>fix changing encoding from utf8 to another was not sending</li>
<li>newsletter background colour now displays in new Gmail</li>
<li>less confusing queue sending status</li>
<li>updated language file (pot) with 20 or so modifications</li>
</ul>

<li>fixed address and unsubscribe links appearing at bottom of newsletter a second time</li>

<li>fixed subscribe from frontend without javascript error</li>
<li>fixed subscribe IP server validation when trying in local</li>
<li>fixed CSS issues with WordPress 3.3</li>
<li>improving interface of email sending in the newsletter's listing</li>
<li>added delete newsletter option</li>

<li>added french translation</li>
</ul>

<li>fixed version number display</li>
</ul>

<li>minor bugfixes</li>
</ul>

<h4>0.9 - 2011/12/3</h4>
